title: Data for my company on Google Finance is incorrect, how can it be corrected?
text:
Refinitiv is responsible only for the following content on Google finance.

Company Facts

Ratios Mailing Address Phone Number

Company Financials

Income Statement Balance Sheet Cash Flow

Related Companies

Sector Industry Category

Company Facts

Home Page Site Links

Company Summary

Management

Officer & Director Names Titles

You may submit details of the error with the url or screenshot attachments here for correction.

For any other type of data content error, photo changes etc, please contact the Google support team to investigate the matter from their end.
description: Refinitiv is responsible only for the following content on Google finance.  Company Facts   Ratios Mailing Address Phone Number  Company...
